entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:34 p.m. MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h except 70 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023
